snippet: A human rights ombudsman said the Pussy Riot band member Nadezhda Tolokonnikova, whose whereabouts were previously unknown, had been transferred to a Siberian prison.
abstract: Russia's human rights ombudsman says that imprisoned Pussy Riot band member Nadezhda Tolokonnikova has been transferred to a prison in Siberia.
lead_paragraph: A human rights ombudsman said the Pussy Riot band member Nadezhda Tolokonnikova, whose whereabouts were previously unknown, had been transferred to a Siberian prison.

headline.main: Russia: Imprisoned Punk Protester Is in Siberia
headline.print_headline: Russia: Punk Protester Sent to Siberia
